lead_paragraph: Arsenal and Manchester United moved closer to a place in the next round of the European Champions League with victories yesterday. Arsenal beat visiting Slavia Prague, 7-0, to equal the biggest margin of victory in the competition’s history. United won, 4-2, at Dynamo Kiev in Ukraine.Arsenal leads Group H with 9 points, 3 more than Sevilla, which defeated last-place Steaua Bucharest, 2-1.United, which leads Group F with 9 points, has 12 goals in its last three games and has allowed only six goals in 14 games this season. AS Roma, is in second place with 6 points after a 2-1 win over Sporting Lisbon.Inter Milan took the lead in Group G after a 2-1 win at CSKA Moscow, pulling ahead of Fenerbahce, which drew, 0-0, at PSV Eindhoven.The two-time champion Barcelona played host Glasgow Rangers to a scoreless draw; they remain tied atop Group E with 7 points.
snippet: Arsenal and Manchester United moved closer to a place in the next round of the European Champions League with victories yesterday. Arsenal beat visiting Slavia Prague, 7-0, to equal the biggest margin of victory in the competition’s history....
